**Society for Computation in Psychology**. A forum for cutting-edge methods for the psychological sciences since 1971. *Computation, information, technology, statistics, applications and more!*

You can view our previous emails to the society [using this link](/emails/). 

### Conference Information

The Annual Meeting of the Society for Computation in Psychology (SCiP) takes place one day before the main conference of the [Psychonomic Society](https://www.psychonomic.org/). SCiP 2022 should be held this year in Boston and more information should be coming soon.
